list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a hollow muscular organ that pumps the blood through the circulatory system by rhythmic contraction and dilation. In vertebrates there may be up to four chambers (as in humans), with two atria and two ventricles.
the central or innermost part of something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: right in the heart of the city
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: ngay trong trung tâm của thành phố

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a conventional representation of a heart with two equal curves meeting at a point at the bottom and a cusp at the top.
the condition of agricultural land as regards fertility.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a well-maintained farm in good heart
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một trang trại được duy trì tốt trong trái tim tốt
Tôi hoàn toàn trái tim bài hát này
